original: 3.3.1. Paccuppannavāra🔽Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānāti so sotāyatanaṁ parijānātīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu āyatanam parijānāti saḥ sota āyatanam parijānāti iti āmantā
translated: The section on full-understanding🔽… The section on the present🔽Does anyone who fully understands the eye-sphere also fully understand the ear-sphere? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ parijānāti so cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānātīti? Āmantā.🔽Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānāti so sotāyatanaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam parijānāti so cakkhu āyatanam parijānāti iti āmantā  yaḥ cakkhu āyatanam na parijānāti saḥ sota āyatanam na parijānāti iti āmantā
translated: Or does anyone who fully understands the ear-sphere also fully understand the eye-sphere? Yes.🔽Does anyone who does not fully understand the eye-sphere not fully understand the ear-sphere? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ na parijānāti so cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam na parijānāti so cakkhu āyatanam na parijānāti iti āmantā
translated: Or does anyone who does not fully understand the ear-sphere not fully understand the eye-sphere? Yes.
